description: This file is a PHP script that generates a web page for editing a Dynamic DNS configuration. It includes server-side PHP code for fetching current settings and client-side JavaScript for UI interactions, form submission, and dynamic element manipulation.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Dynamically adds a new Host Name input field to the form.

methods.name: add1
methods.description: Removes the last Host Name input field and associated elements from the form.
